mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO high_speed_passenger ( id, line_code, train_code, site_id, line_site_id, upline_code, operation_date, operation_time, distance_order, is_start_site, is_end_site, arrival_time, departure_time, stop_time, passenger_flow, upline_passenger_flow, downline_passenger_flow, boarding_count, alighting_count, remarks, train_departure_date, train_departure_time, site_sequence, ticket_type, ticket_price, seat_type_code, train_company_code, start_date, start_station_telecode, start_station, end_station_telecode, end_station, train_level_code, train_type_code, ticket_station, farthest_arrival_station, ticket_time, arrival_station, revenue, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.lineCode}, #{item.trainCode}, #{item.siteId}, #{item.lineSiteId}, #{item.uplineCode}, #{item.operationDate}, #{item.operationTime}, #{item.distanceOrder}, #{item.isStartSite}, #{item.isEndSite}, #{item.arrivalTime}, #{item.departureTime}, #{item.stopTime}, #{item.passengerFlow}, #{item.uplinePassengerFlow}, #{item.downlinePassengerFlow}, #{item.boardingCount}, #{item.alightingCount}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.trainDepartureDate}, #{item.trainDepartureTime}, #{item.siteSequence}, #{item.ticketType}, #{item.ticketPrice}, #{item.seatTypeCode}, #{item.trainCompanyCode}, #{item.startDate}, #{item.startStationTelecode}, #{item.startStation}, #{item.endStationTelecode}, #{item.endStation}, #{item.trainLevelCode}, #{item.trainTypeCode}, #{item.ticketStation}, #{item.farthestArrivalStation}, #{item.ticketTime}, #{item.arrivalStation}, #{item.revenue}, NOW(), NOW() )
